rows.label: tlk45320152_10_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, where am I going to
find a good teacher?

rows.label: tlk45320152_10_msg0002
rows.name:
Well, my dream is to become
a cool and powerful Driver
like Meleph-sama.

rows.label: tlk45320152_10_msg0003
rows.name:
I'd love to be able to wield
a Blade as magnificent as
Kagutsuchi-sama someday!

rows.label: tlk45320152_10_msg0004
rows.name:
But I don't know anyone with
the skills to train me to
reach that kind of level.

rows.label: tlk45320152_10_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm looking for a great teacher who
could train me to become stronger!

rows.label: tlk45320152_10_msg0006
rows.name:
Oh, you know someone
who could help me?!

rows.label: tlk45320152_10_msg0007
rows.name:
That's wonderful! You'll have
to introduce me to them soon!
